question: Who among the following is called "Durga of Indian Football"?
explanation: Oinam Bembem Devi will be honoured with the prestigious Arjuna Award. Bembem, the flag bearer of Indian women's football over the past two decades, becomes the second Indian woman footballer to win the award, the first being Shanti Mullick in 1983. Bembem, nicknamed the "Durga of Indian Football" made her international debut in 1995. She bowed out on a high after winning the SAF Games Gold Medal in Shillong in February 2015.
